channel.title: [PI] General store
channel.description: I was wondering how i could make so the general store buys everything you sell to him. Atm i cant sell nothing to the general store..

item.title: [PI] General store
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

^Correct.
the shops.cfg looks a little like:
shop-space-=-space-ID-tab-1-tab-1or2-tab-itemID-tab-amount
and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] General store
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

Not sure about PI, but on Delta the code for the shops has will have 2 numbers at the beginning (after shop = #) at the beginning, the 1st number represents whether you can buy things from the shop and the 2nd number represents whether you can sell things to the shop, 1 = no 2 = yes, maybe there is something like that in the code.

Read full topic
